text: Shepherd Express is an progressive weekly newspaper in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, United States. It is the third largest newspaper in the state of Wisconsin. Its original title was the "Crazy Shepherd", a name that comes from a line in poet Allen Ginsberg’s poem “Footnotes to Howl”. == Official Website == Shepherd Express Website == References == Category:Newspapers in the United States Category:Milwaukee Category:1982 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Wisconsin
title: Shepherd Express
